alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Dawson; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 6:55PM CDT until May 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Andrews County in western Texas... Eastern Gaines County in western Texas... Northwestern Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 653 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located on a line extending 10 miles southeast of Gaines County Airport, or 13 miles south o Seminole, moving north-northeast at 25 mph. A gust of 61 mph was reported at Seminole airport at 645 PM CDT. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seminole, Seagraves, Seagraves Airport, Gaines County Airport, Loop, McKenzie Lake and Gaines County Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
